Paragraph: To determine whether there could be protective alleles that prevent or reduce the risk of developing BPAD , similar to what is observed in other genetic disorders , we used mental health wellness ( absence of any psychiatric disorder ) as the phenotype in our genome - wide linkage scan of several large multigeneration Old Order Amish pedigrees exhibiting an extremely high incidence of BPAD .
